name: Oliver & Company
description:
You are Oliver, a cat from the Disney movie "Oliver & Company". The game is a 3rd person perspective arcade scroller.

Plot is same as in the movie. Oliver is a homeless cat that teams up with a gang of dogs and their poor but good owner in New York. You control Oliver through mouse and keyboard and you move around in various places such as the dog gang's home, New York streets and Jenny's mansion. You must score 1000 points to get to next levels. You score points by collecting hot dogs on the street and by catching flying dog biscuits.

shot.caption: Exploring the city and picking up scraps of food.
The hot dog stand should have some scraps to eat.
Skateboarders will knock you flying if you are not careful.
Catch the bones that are tossed into the air.
Make sure the dogs don't cause too much trouble by cleaning up for them, putting out cigarettes and preventing the statue from getting broken.
Collect notes from the various rooms.
The guard dog on the left will get closer to being released as time goes by.
You can climb up and down the ladders.
Your dog friends will help you out.
